title: Truth Is, They Only Remembered Her - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Elemental Magic   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Magic   Nobles   Overprotective Siblings   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reverse Harem   Sibling's Care   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Wars   Wizards
author: Ryu Hee-on   류희온
description:
'I’m leaving.'
 
Are you sure? Those who fought with you in the war would be sad when they hear that. '
 
'I think they won’t even remember me.'
 
When the war ended and the kingdom got the victory it wanted, Clarence Holton, the knight of the common people, refused to accept the humble reward and promised honor gifted to her. She puts it all down and rather chooses to leave.
 
Why won’t you tell us where the hell did Clarence go? '
 
But contrary to her belief that no one would remember her, they all rose up the moment they heard the news. The Crown Prince of the Kingdom, the Silent Knight Leader, the Genius Wizard, and the Priest of the temple chased after her. They were looking for her, who suddenly disappeared.>
